channel.title: Music – Lionel Richie
channel.description: Recent content in Lionel Richie on Music

item.title: Lionel Richie - Still
item.description:
작곡: Lionel Richie / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 1990

Lady
morning’s just
A moment away
and I’m without
You once again
you laughed at me
You said
you never needed me
I wonder
if you need me now
So many dreams
that flew away
So many words
we didn’t say
Two people
lost in a storm
Where did we go
where’d we go
We lost what we
both had found
You know we let
each other down
But them most of all
I do love you still-

We played the games
that people play
We made our mistakes
along the way
Somehow I know
deep in my heart
You needed me
‘cause I
Needed you
so desperatly
We were too
blind to see
But them most of all
I do love you still-

item.title: Lionel Richie - Say You Say Me
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Lionel Richie
KY: 2385 / KY: 7116

Say you say me
Say it for always
That’s the way
it should be
Say you say me
Say it together
naturally
I had a dream
I had an awesome dream
people in the park
playing games
in the dark
And what they played
was a masquerade
But from behind
the walls of doubt
a voice was crying out
Say you say me
Say it for always
That’s the way
it should be
Say you say me
Say it together
naturally
As we go down life’s
lonesome highway
seems the hardest
thing to do
is to find
a friend or two
The helping hand
someone who understands
And when you feel
you’ve lost your way
you’ve got someone
there to say
I’ll show you
Say you say me
Say it for always
That’s the way
it should be
Say you say me
Say it together
naturally
So you think
you know the answers
Oh no
Well the whole world’s
got ya dancing
that’s right
I’m telling you
It’s time to start
believing oh yes
Believe in who you are
you are a shining star
Say you say me
Say it for always
That’s the way
it should be
Say you say me
Say it together
naturally
Say it together
naturally-

item.title: Lionel Richie - Three Times A Lady
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 2694

Thanks for the times
that you’ve given me
the memories are
all in my mind
And now that
we’re come to
the end of our rainbow
there’s something
I must say out loud
You’re once twice
three times a lady
And I love you
Yes you’re once-
twice three times
a lady and I love you
I love you.

You’ve shared my dreams
my joys my pains
You’ve made my life
worth living for
And if I had to live
my life over again dear
I’d spend each and
ev’ry moment with you
You’re once twice
three times a lady
And I love you
Yes you’re once twice
three times a lady
and I love you
I love you.

When we are together
the moments
I cherish with
ev’ry beat of my heart
To touch you
to hold you
to feel you
to need you
there’s nothing
to keep us a part.

You’re once twice
three times a lady
And I love you
Yes you’re once
twice three times
a lady and I love you
Yes you’re once
twice three times
a lady I love you
I love you.

item.title: Lionel Richie - Stuck On You
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Lionel Richie
KY: 8934 / KY: 20578

Stuck on you
I’ve got
This feeling down
deep in my soul
That I just can’t lose
guess I’m on my way
Needed a friend
and the way I feel
Now I guess
I’ll be with you
Till the end
guess I’m on my way
Mighty glad
you stayed-

I’m stuck on you
been a fool too long
I guess
it’s time for me
To come on home
guess I’m on my way
So hard to see
that a woman like you
Could wait
around for a man
Like me
guess I’m on my way
Mighty glad
you stayed-

Oh I’m leaving on
that midnight train
Tommorrow and I know
just where I’m going
I’ve packed up
my troubles
And I’ve thrown them
all away
Because this time
little darling
I’m coming home
to stay
I’m stuck on you
I’ve got
This feeling down
deep in my soul
That I just can’t lose
guess I’m on my way
Needed a friend
and the way I feel
Now I guess
I’ll be with you
Till the end
guess I’m on my way
I’m mighty glad
you stayed-

item.title: Lionel Richie - I'm In Love
item.description:
작곡: ERIKSEN MIKKEL, SMITH… / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 63178 / KY: 20599

Say na na na na
I’m in love
Na na na na
I’m in love
Na na na na
I’m in love
No tears
no tears no more
I’m done
crying out
No gain
no pain
Said I found
another way
No games
not like before
Not up here
on this cloud
No time for yesterday
let me explain
I got a
new woman
Lovin’ me in every way
that she can
All she wanna be is
part of my plan
Safe to say that
I’m in a better way
A better
way hey
You got a
new woman
Loves to walk around
just holding my hand
Cupid must
have found us
Loving like that
loving this woman
Does anybody
understand
That I’m in Love
(I’m in love)
And I think about the
real thing (real love)
Kind of
love that makes your
Heart say
(I’m in love)
You got me singing
la la la la la
Say I’m in Love
(I’m in love)
And I think if I’m the
real thing (real love)
Kind of
love that makes your
heart say
(I’m in love)
You got me
singing
La la la la la la
I’m in love
No stress
no fuss no fight
When I’m
in your arms
No time
no day no night
(No nothing
better no)
So much
more than ok (ok)
Life is
made of this
No her no me no way
let me explain
I got a
new woman
Lovin’ me in every way
that she can
All she wanna be is
part of my plan
Safe to say that
I’m in a better way
A better
way hey
You got a
new woman
Loves to walk around
just holding my hand
Cupid must
have found us
Loving like that
loving this woman
Does anybody
understand
That I’m in love
(I’m in love)
And I think about the
real thing (real love)
Kind of
love that makes your
Heart say
(I’m in love)
You got me singing
la la la la la
Say I’m in love
(I’m in love)
And I think if I’m the
real thing (real love)
Kind of
love that makes your
Heart say
(I’m in love)
You got me
singing
La la la la la la
I’m in love
I want the whole damn
world to know
Sure as the
wind blows
To carry the message
far as it can go
That I’m
in love yeah
Nothing that can hold
back this feeling
True love in which
we are dealing
Baby
I I I I I’m in love
I I I I
I’m in love
I I I’m
in love uhm~
Na na na na
I’m in love
Na na na na
I’m in love
Na na na na
I’m in love
That I’m in love
(I’m in love)
And I think about the
real thing (real love)
Kind of
love that makes your
Heart say
(I’m in love)
You got me singing
la la la la la
Say I’m in love
(I’m in love)
And I think if I’m the
real thing (real love)
Kind of
love that makes your
Heart say
(I’m in love)
You got me
singing
La la la la la la
I’m in love

item.title: Lionel Richie - Hello
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: RICHIE LIONEL B
KY: 1065 / KY: 7103

I’ve been alone
with you inside my mind
And in my dreams
I’ve kissed your lips
a thousand times
I sometimes
see you pass
outside my door
Hello is it me you’re
looking for
I can see it
in your eyes
I can see it
in your smile
You’re all
I’ve ever wanted
and my arms
are open wide
Cause you know just
what to say
and you know just
what to do
And I want to tell you
so much I love you
I long to see the
sunlight in your hair
And tell you time and
time again
how much I care
Sometimes I feel my
heart will overflow
Hello I’ve just got to
let you know
Cause I wonder
where you are
and I wonder
what you do
Are you somewhere
feeling lonely
or is someone
loving you
Tell me how to
win your heart for
I haven’t got a clue
But let me start by
saying I love you

Hello is it me
you’re looking for
Cause I wonder
where you are
and I wonder
what you do
Are you somewhere
feeling lonely
or is someone
loving you
Tell me how to
win your heart
for I haven’t
got a clue
But let me start by
saying I love you

item.title: Lionel Richie - All Night Long
item.description:
작곡: Lionel Richie / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8813 / KY: 7296

La la oh- oh-
well my friends
The time has come
raise the roof
And have some fun
throw away the work
To be done
let the music play on
Everybody sing
everybody dance
Lose yourself
in wild romance
We’re going to parti’
karamu fiesta forever
Come on and sing along
we’re going to parti’
Karamu fiesta forever
come on and sing along
All night long
all night
All night long
all night
All night long
all night
All night long
oh yeah-
People dancing
all in the street
See the rhythm
911 in their feet
Life is good wild
and sweet
Let the music
play on
Feet it
in your heart
And feel it
in your soul
Let the music
take control
We’re going to parti’
liming fiesta forever
Come on and
sing my song
All night long oh-
all night long yeah
All night long yeah
all night long yeah
Once you get started
you can’t sit down
Come join the fun
it’s a merry go round
Everyone’s dancing
their troubles away
Come join our party
see how we play
Tom bo li de say
de moi ya
Yeah jumbo jumbo
way to parti’
O we goin’
oh jambali
Tom bo li de say
de moi ya
Yeah jumbo jumbo
oh— yes we’re gonna
Have a party yeah
all night long
All night
all night long
All night
all night long
All night
all night long
Everyone you meet
they’re jamming
In the street
all night long
Everyone you meet
they’re jamming
In the street
all night long-
